Posts.EditableText: Obviously there will be the IF Comp 2008. But also there is the [b:joryzylh]Spring Thing 2008.[/b:joryzylh] You can get info for it by going here: http://www.springthing.net/2008 There is no playing time limit (like the main comp's 2 hour rule). Deadline to enter: March 1st. [b:joryzylh]The Interactive Short Fiction Fiction Contest:[/b:joryzylh] No...this is not run by Emily Short (but maybe it should be). You can get info on it here: http://mark.engelberg.googlepages.com/i ... ompetition This one would be a good one for fresh Quest authors. The deadline is Feb 15. [b:joryzylh]The Saugus Halloween Contest:[/b:joryzylh] This is open to both short fiction (horror) and IF (horror). They have not put up any info about 2008 yet, but I'll let you know. Obviously, you would need to have this done by next October. [b:joryzylh] One Room Comp:[/b:joryzylh] You just missed this years, but there will probably be one next year. Again, I'll let you know. [b:joryzylh]IF Art Show:[/b:joryzylh] They did it last year, maybe they will do it this year. I'll update as I find out. [b:joryzylh]THE YULETIDE FROTH CHRISTMAS QUEST COMP:[/b:joryzylh] See the other post for info. Anyway, when I get more info on any of these I'll post up some links.
Posts.HTML:
Obviously there will be the IF Comp 2008.

But also there is the Spring Thing 2008. You can get info for it by going here:
http://www.springthing.net/2008
There is no playing time limit (like the main comp's 2 hour rule).
Deadline to enter: March 1st.

The Interactive Short Fiction Fiction Contest:
No...this is not run by Emily Short (but maybe it should be). You can get info on it here:
http://mark.engelberg.googlepages.com/i ... ompetition
This one would be a good one for fresh Quest authors.
The deadline is Feb 15.

The Saugus Halloween Contest:
This is open to both short fiction (horror) and IF (horror). They have not put up any info about 2008 yet, but I'll let you know. Obviously, you would need to have this done by next October.

One Room Comp:
You just missed this years, but there will probably be one next year. Again, I'll let you know.

IF Art Show:
They did it last year, maybe they will do it this year. I'll update as I find out.

THE YULETIDE FROTH CHRISTMAS QUEST COMP:
See the other post for info.


Anyway, when I get more info on any of these I'll post up some links.
